description.value: The nosferatu can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dominate] at will as a divine innate spell. Casting it requires staring into the target's eyes, giving the spell the visual trait (@Check[type:will|dc:]). The save DC uses a high DC for the nosferatu's level, and a creature that succeeds is temporarily immune to that nosferatu's Dominate for 24 hours. Fully destroying the nosferatu ends the domination, but merely reducing the nosferatu to 0 HP is insufficient to break the spell.
